title: What’s Next: ‘Italexit’ or a European Union Crack-Up?
description: As economic aid from Brussels is debated and delayed, millions of Mediterraneans are already questioning the European project. The post What’s Next: ‘Italexit’ or a European Union Crack-Up? appeared first on The American Conservative.
content: As economic aid from Brussels is debated and delayed, millions of Mediterraneans are already questioning the European project.Since the birth of the European Union, there has been an intense debate about the possibility of creating a two-track Europe, divided… [+9196 chars]
